text: Alistair McDowall is a playwright who grew up in Great Broughton in the North East of England. His play Brilliant Adventures was awarded a Bruntwood Prize in 2011. His plays include X at the Royal Court Theatre, Pomona at the Orange Tree Theatre, Talk Show at the Royal Court Theatre, Captain Amazing at the Edinburgh Fringe and Soho Theatre, and Brilliant Adventures at the Royal Exchange Theatre.
